title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You run the risk of being overly dramatic at an inopportune moment today, especially when it comes to any perceived slights. The hypersensitive conjunction between the thin-skinned Pisces Moon and hazy Neptune may prompt you to unfairly misread a loved ones intentions. You likely want to hide your instinctive cravings for attention, but your feelings are written all over your face now. In fact, you could end up projecting your own inner turmoil onto someone else. Be honest and clear about your needs. Risk rejection, and you might be pleasantly surprised by how others are happy to accommodate you. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
